revision.comment: Lang section formatting (wrong order, missing dividers, remove interwikis, category placement)
revision.text: ==Navajo== {{nv-prefixes|b|di-them|yi-trans|3s|l}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-kaal|perfective}} {{nv-link-to-root|-KAAL|press}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she [[lean]]s on it # he/she [[brace]]s him/herself against it # he/she [[exert]]s pressure on it # he/she is [[apply oneself#Verb|applying himself/herself]], putting effort into it # he/she [[nag]]s someone, is after someone to # he/she [[give]]s his/her full attention to it (a task) ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|neuter perfective|yii}}. {{nv-verbtable|PERFECTIVE |bidiishkaal|bidiilkaal|bidadiilkaal |bidinilkaal|bidoołkaal|bidadoołkaal |yidiilkaal|yidadiilkaal|bizhdiilkaal|bidazhdiilkaal}}
